RapidFit:
////////////////////////////////////////// // Reference file for fit to data //////////////////////////////////////////
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBU 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//.......................................... // True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.7 0.0 1.5 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.0 -1.0 1.0 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.16 0.0 0.5 Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.60 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
As_sq 0.00 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
delta_para 3.1 -6.3 6.6 Free Unitless
delta_perp -0.17 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 0.0 Fixed Unitless
deltaM 17.7 Free ps-1
Phi_s BsOlivier 3.0 3.1 0.0 6.28318530718 Free Unitless
// Signal Mass parameters for double Gaussian mass model
f_sig_m1 // Fraction of first Gaussian 1.0 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1 // Gaussian width in MeV 7.47 0.0 20.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
sigma_m2 20.0 10.0 100.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs 5366.4 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolution1Fraction // This is the fraction of the first Gaussian 0.64 //Set to 1 when you want to only use a single time resolution Fixed unitless
timeResolution1 // This is the first Gaussian width 0.0337 // when set to 0.00 then the fancy error function stuff is bypassed Fixed ps
timeResolution2 0.0646 Fixed ps
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 0.983695 //0.978305 Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 1.02313 //1.03132 Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 1.02428 //1.03268 Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 -0.000087511 //-0.0000318417 Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 -0.000130425 //-0.000219174 Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 0.00646512 //-0.000171136 Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 1.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 0.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 0.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 0.0 Fixed Unitless
// Mistag calibration
mistagScale 1.0 0.5 1.5 Free
mistagOffset 0.0 -0.5 0.5 Free
//............................................ // Background model
// Long lived lifetime components for double exponential model
f_LL1 // Fraction of first exponential 0.989 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1 // First exponent 0.236 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2 //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_II // Fraction of first exponential 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_II // First exponent 0.236 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_II //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Fixed Unitless
//Exponential background mass model
alphaM_pr // exponent 0.00135 Free Unitless
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2 0.00 Fixed Unitless
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit NegativeLogLikelihood
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.77 0.12
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagScale 1.01 0.12
mistagOffset 0.338 0.012
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00000001
//======================================== // UN-BIASED TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBT
Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v1
Bs2JpsiPhiMassSignal
Bs2JpsiPhiLongLivedBkg_withTimeRes
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
